resources.string:
\ Logic : 
 Used help from online computer science websites like stackoverflow and geeks for geeks for reading string from files

 Images : 
 Background image for the app was obtained from google images and then converted into negative to match the look.

 Sounds : 
 New Sounds added to the Scrobble Game was obtained from Non Copyright Sounds (Youtube) 


Issues : 
 StackOverflow for helping me solve a problem that I was facing when accessing context from a static perspective.


Help from people : 
 Vaibhav Shukla

\ Hello!! 
 Welcome to Scroggle, a game for smart people. You would have to race against time to finish the game.

 Phase 1 : 
 On a board, you have to play scrobble. In each of the 9 small grids, try to come up with a word as long as you can 

 Phase 2 : 
 Now that you are done with scrabble, its time to select some letters from the correct words that you made to go to the next phase of the game (Boggle!)


Phase 3 : 
 Aaaand! Its Boggle time! Now that you have scored a lot, you would play boggle from the letters that you selected. Try to maximize your points!

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.
